logs-messages-desc: Inform you of message events, such as deleting/editing messages.
logs-voice-desc: Inform you of voice events, such as joining/leaving/moving voice channels.
logs-member-desc: Inform you of member events, such as joining/leaving/banning members.
duration-inform: Mention staff if a freshly created Discord account enters the server.
logs-messages-block: Block channels where messages not logged
